org.jgentleframework.core.factory
Class InOutExecutor

java.lang.Object
  org.jgentleframework.core.factory.InOutExecutor

public abstract class InOutExecutor
extends java.lang.Object

This is an abstract class that is responsible for dependency data controller and processer.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com

getInjectedDependency

public static java.lang.Object getInjectedDependency(Inject inject,
                                                     java.lang.Class<?> type,
                                                     Provider provider)
Returns the specified injected dependency instance.

Parameters:
inject - the corresponding Inject instance
type - the type of original target.
provider - the given Provider.
Returns:
returns the dependency instance if it exists, if not, returns null.
